## Discussion

To get an instance of [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INVoiceShortcutCenter], always use the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INVoiceShortcutCenter/shared] class property. Creating an instance of the shortcut center isn’t allowed.

# shared

**Type Property**

The shared shortcut center.

## Declaration

```swift
class var shared: INVoiceShortcutCenter { get }
```

## Discussion

To get an instance of [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INVoiceShortcutCenter], always use the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INVoiceShortcutCenter/shared] class property. Creating an instance of the shortcut center isn’t allowed.
title: shared
